party-sheet.name: Name
party-sheet.no-players: No players are currently logged in.
party-sheet.no-systems: You do not have any json files for this sytem in your data/totm folder. Please add some to enable this feature.

hide-sheet.hint: Edit which characters are displayed if not showing online characters.

enable-minimal-view.name: Hide Support Buttons
enable-minimal-view.hint: Hide the buttons for bug reports, feedback, and Discord.

enable-only-online.name: Show only online characters
enable-only-online.hint: Only show characters assigned to logged in players. Turning this off will show all non-NPC characters but allow you to 'hide' the ones you don't care about.

enable-sounds.name: Enable Syrinscape Sounds
enable-sounds.hint: Sound support requires the Syrinscape Integration (fvtt-synrin-control) and Midi QOL (midi-qol) modules.

enable-dark-mode.name: Enable Dark Mode
enable-dark-mode.hint: Enable dark mode for the party sheet.

show-debug-info.name: Show Debug Information
show-debug-info.hint: Enable this to show debug information in the console for all parsed characters when the party sheet is opened. Hopefully this will allow you to track down specific properties that you are trying to parse.
